description: Testing model behavior with no image features and no caption
question: Will these magnets attract or repel each other?
rationale: Solution: Will these magnets attract or repel? To find out, look at which poles are closest to each other.nThe north pole of one magnet is closest to the south pole of the other magnet. Poles that are different attract. So, these magnets will attract each other.

description: Testing with only image/caption, no additional context
question: Will these magnets attract or repel each other?
rationale: Solution: To predict if these magnets will attract or repel, look at which poles are closest to each other.nThe north pole of one magnet is closest to the north pole of the other magnet. Like poles repel. So, these magnets will repel each other.
